physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a multi-storey roofed building in the background towards the left hand side of the photograph. The building comes with a portico and potted plants can be seen in it. The foreground of the photograph shows a garden where there are shrubs and greenery.
title_text: 12 Scotts Road, Our Billett, 1946 Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
